question: The birth anniversary of which great Indian leader was recently celebrated on January 23 as National Day of Patriotism?
explanation:
The 123rd birth anniversary of the great Indian Leader, also called as Netaji, Subash Chandra Bose was recently celebrated. The day is celebrated as the National Day of Patriotism. 
The Government of India has instituted an annual award known as the ‘Subhash Chandra Bose Aapda Prabandhan Puraskar’ in the field of disaster management. The award is presented to recognise the work done by individuals and institutions in India in the disaster management field. The award is announced every year on 23rd January, which is the birth anniversary of Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose.
